item.title:
the paradigm data tools chat is the largest and most active place to discuss crypto data science + data engineering
we cultivated this chat by building sovereign data tools. sovereign data goes beyond open source. it means you can have full control over the entire data pipeline

item.title:
the last major increase to ethereum's gas limit was in 2021
in that time, consumer hardware has roughly doubled in speed + capacity. ethereum node clients have also become significantly more performant
pump the gas ‚õΩ‚õΩ

item.title:
in case you missed it, many members of the EF (such as @dankrad, @adietrichs, @nero_eth) and many of the core dev teams, have publicly voiced support for scaling the L1 over the past month
this is a shift from the L2-centric roadmap to a more comprehensive scaling strategy
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm

item.title:
smart ppl think in distributions because distributions capture the noise+complexity of realworld phenomena
but so far, prediction markets only allow expressing simple yes-no beliefs
Dave's new AMM enables decentralized prediction markets for expressing distributional beliefs

item.title: beyond just being memetically popular, what is the financial mechanics explanation for how xrp got to a $156B valuation? ($274B FDV). low liquidity + diamond handed whales?
item.dc:creator: @notnotstorm
item.description: beyond just being memetically popular, what is the financial mechanics explanation for how xrp got to a $156B valuation? ($274B FDV). low liquidity + diamond handed whales?

item.title:
RT by @notnotstorm: I think it is time we increased the gas limit.
If you run a validator, you can contribute to this -- every block acts as a vote on whether to increase it. If more than 50% of the stake agrees to an increase, the gas limit will increase.
I just set my validators to vote for up to 60m gas.
item.dc:creator: @dankrad
item.description:
I think it is time we increased the gas limit.

If you run a validator, you can contribute to this -- every block acts as a vote on whether to increase it. If more than 50% of the stake agrees to an increase, the gas limit will increase.

I just set my validators to vote for up to 60m gas.

item.title:
RT by @notnotstorm: Over the last few days I've been working on a post that aims to safely pick a blob count for Pectra by looking at blocks proposed by Solo Stakers and then observed by Home Users.
TL;DR 4/8 and 6/9 are both safe for Mainnet
https://ethresear.ch/t/block-arrivals-home-stakers-bumping-the-blob-count/21096
item.dc:creator: @samcmAU
item.description:
Over the last few days I've been working on a post that aims to safely pick a blob count for Pectra by looking at blocks proposed by Solo Stakers and then observed by Home Users.

TL;DR 4/8 and 6/9 are both safe for Mainnet

ethresear.ch/t/block-arrival‚Ä¶

item.title:
RT by @notnotstorm: NEW @paradigm Research: The 5 Levels of Secure Hardware.
Secure hardware combined with cryptography can be extremely powerful.
We frame FIVE levels to secure hardware, where each level gives us access to more use cases, better performance, and higher security.
Let's build.
item.dc:creator: @gakonst
